Text:
This is a Cam.  
V:4 The outliine of everthing is a blur   
A:2 It really echoes.
Other than that, great upload. Virus free.

You can turn on the English subtitles, but even that has long stretches missing, so there are a few long parts that have no translation whatsoever. Enough is intact that you can get most of the story, but unless you know French, German, or Dutch you're going to be wondering what's going on for a some of it.
